title: Poster, Shaping Culture
medium: silk screen on thin wove paper
description:
On green ground, an abstract shape of a circular saw in white cutting the text of an announcement in two columns. Imprinted in green along upper left of saw: "Shaping Culture." Inscribed in white with copyright: "Design by A. Gelman.1996."
The text of announcement is imprinted in white and reads as follows:
" + design dialog//  FEB/22/96/ -- daren + daven joy/ north american stijl life/ architecture and furniture makers/ (san francisco)//  MAR/7/96 -- paola antonelli/ curator of design, museum of modern art/ (new york)// MAR/21/96 -- john thackara/ design critic author and educator/ (netherlands)// APR/11/96 -- wes jones/ architect/ (san francisco)// MAY/2/96 -- ron arad/ furniture designer, entrepreneur, educator/ london/ 7:00 - 9:30 pm, admission: free/ sponcor: industrial design department the university/ of the arts at cbs auditorium, haviland hall at broad and/ pine streets, philadelphia, pa."

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, Shaping Culture. silk screen on thin wove paper. Gift of Design Machine. 1998-32-13.
